author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

SA reported about a dead initialization of `numOfBins`
That warning pointed out at a possible unwanted overwriting of that variable inside a loop: therefore, besides solving the dead initialization issue I also made all those values `const`, to avoid all such possible unwanted rewritings

#### PR validation:

It builds in scram
title: Clean up and avoid possible misuse of the numOfBins variable in DiamondSampicDQMSource
